# r4jecs

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.com/fabregithub/r4jecs.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/fabregithub/r4jecs)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of r4jecs is to gather and publish useful functions for data analysis in the Japan Environment and Children's Study (JECS)

## Installation

You can install the released version of r4jecs from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("r4jecs")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("fabregithub/r4jecs")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(r4jecs)
## basic example code
```
